meanings.definition: The study of small-scale features and structures within materials or substances.
meanings.sent1: Micromorphology helps scientists understand tiny details in objects.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use micromorphology to examine the small parts of rocks.
meanings.sent3: Studying micromorphology is like solving a puzzle with minuscule pieces.
meanings.sent4: The world of micromorphology reveals hidden secrets beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: Through micromorphology, we uncover the intricate world invisible to the naked eye.

meanings.definition: The analysis of microscopic details in geology or archaeology.
meanings.sent1: In geology, micromorphology helps identify tiny rock components.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists rely on micromorphology to study ancient artifacts up close.
meanings.sent3: Looking at micromorphology under a microscope feels like exploring a miniature universe.
meanings.sent4: The significance of micromorphology in uncovering history cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The precision of micromorphology reveals the past in remarkable detail.
